Name: Trello
FreeSummary: Kanban, Mobile app, Up to 10 boards
FreePlan: Up to 10 boards, Unlimited cards, Kanban view, Mobile apps, 10 collaborators, 10MB file uploads
Features: Kanban, Templates, Mobile App, Calendar View
FullDescription: Trello is an intuitive visual task management app based on Kanban boards. It’s ideal for personal to small team use, thanks to its simplicity and fast setup. The free version is feature-rich, but not designed for complex workflows.
Quote: So simple, we started using it on day one.

Name: Monday.com
FreeSummary: Up to 2 users, Kanban, Templates, 500MB storage
FreePlan: Up to 2 seats, Unlimited boards, 200+ templates, Kanban & Calendar views, 500MB storage, Mobile apps
Integrations: Slack, Outlook, Google Drive, MS Teams
FullDescription: Monday.com is a work operating system for managing any type of project or workflow. Its flexible board structure, variety of views, and strong collaboration tools make it powerful for teams of all sizes. Built-in templates and automation save hours of repetitive setup.
Quote: Beautiful, flexible, and fast to onboard.

Name: Notion
FreePlan: Unlimited pages & blocks, Kanban/Table/Calendar views, Templates, Collaboration, Web Clipper
FullDescription: Notion is an all-in-one workspace where teams can write docs, track tasks, manage databases, and build internal wikis. Its flexible block system and huge community of templates make it highly customizable. Great for documentation + task management in one.
Quote: Replaces 3 tools at once and still feels minimal.

Name: Wrike
FreeSummary: Kanban, Gantt, Table, Up to 2GB storage
FreePlan: Unlimited users, Kanban & Gantt views, Table view, Task management, Folder hierarchies, 2GB storage, Web/Mobile apps
Integrations: Google Drive, MS Teams, Slack, Salesforce
FullDescription: Wrike is a robust project management tool built for growing teams and enterprises. It combines detailed planning views, automations, and reporting into one platform. Ideal for marketing, creative, and operations teams looking for full visibility into projects.
Quote: Great for detailed planning and big-picture control.

Name: Paymo
FreeSummary: Kanban, Time tracking, Up to 5 clients
FreePlan: Kanban and List views, Time tracking, Task dependencies, Up to 5 clients, Limited invoicing, 1GB storage, 1 user only
FullDescription: Paymo is a work and project management tool tailored for small to medium-sized teams. It combines task management with powerful time tracking, billing, and client handling. Great for agencies and freelancers who need to manage both project execution and finances in one place.
Quote: Perfect blend of task management and time tracking for freelancers and teams.

Name: Smartsheet
FreePlan: Up to 2 editors, 1 sheet and 2 dashboards, Kanban, Gantt and Grid views, 500MB attachment storage, Limited automations
FullDescription: Smartsheet is a powerful project and work management platform that looks and feels like a spreadsheet but adds collaboration, Gantt charts, automation, and enterprise-level integrations. It’s best suited for teams already comfortable with Excel or Google Sheets who need more project control and visibility.
Quote: Like spreadsheets on steroids. Fantastic for planning and automating workflows.

Name: ClickUp
FreePlan: Unlimited users & tasks, 100MB storage, Kanban, Docs
Features: Kanban, Docs, Gantt, Templates, AI, Time Tracking
Integrations: Google Drive, Slack, Zoom, Zapier, GitHub
FullDescription: ClickUp is an all-in-one productivity platform offering unmatched customization. With views like Kanban, Gantt, and Timeline, it's ideal for large teams and complex workflows. The platform also offers native Docs, AI features, and goal tracking. While powerful, it may overwhelm small teams or those needing simpler tools.
Quote: Perfect for scaling and customizing every aspect of work.

Name: Asana
Integrations: Microsoft Teams, Slack, Google Workspace, Zoom
FullDescription: Asana simplifies task and project tracking for teams of all sizes. Its visual boards, timeline, and calendar help keep work organized. The free version supports collaboration for up to 15 users. For more advanced features like workload tracking and custom rules, a paid plan is required.
Quote: Helps teams stay focused and hit deadlines.

Name: Taskade
FreePlan: Unlimited tasks, 3 users, real-time sync, templates, kanban
Features: Kanban, Templates, Calendar, AI, Real-time Editing
FullDescription: Taskade is a minimalist collaboration platform built for real-time team productivity. With kanban boards, outlines, and mind maps, it supports flexible project structures. Great for small teams working remotely or async. The interface is clean and easy to use with built-in AI and templates.
Quote: So simple our team started using it instantly.

Name: Teamwork
FreePlan: 5 users, 2 projects, time tracking, messaging, limited storage
Integrations: Slack, MS Teams, Google Drive, Dropbox
FullDescription: Teamwork is designed for teams managing client work. It features time tracking, invoicing, and workload management out of the box. Ideal for freelancers and agencies. The free plan is limited in projects but sufficient to evaluate the core experience.
Quote: Built with agencies and client-facing teams in mind.

Name: GanttPRO
FreePlan: No free plan. 14-day free trial with full access to features
Integrations: Google Drive, Jira, Slack, MS Teams
FullDescription: GanttPRO is a powerful project management tool built around interactive Gantt charts. It provides task dependencies, time logs, templates, and workload views. Though it lacks a forever free plan, the 14-day trial offers a full experience to assess its value for professional project management.
Quote: If Gantt is your thing, GanttPRO does it better than anyone.
